title: my msi gt70 keeps shutting down whenever i try and play a game. please help

replies.body: That sounds like a scary case with your hardware.  :(  This could just be an overheating issue, though!  Double check your air vents to make sure it has good airflow.  Test it in a custom, and if it continues then grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can dig into this with you to find some options.
